title: Ninth Netherworld Celestial Emperor - Novel Updates
author: 给力
description:
In order to seize the Divine Treasure, the Source of Everything, the strongest of the generation,  the Ninth Netherworld Celestial Emperor, was slain and fell from the heavens.

Reborn as a youth named Shi Feng and relying on his past memories, he piled the corpses of geniuses left and right, he walked upon heaps of skulls and bones and returned to the peak of being a Celestial Emperor.>
